text: Frank Fakaotimanava Lui, (19 November 1935 - 9 July 2021) was a Niuean politician. He was the Premier of the Pacific Island state of Niue from 12 March 1993 through 26 March 1999. Lui was appointed a Companion of the New Zealand Order of Merit in the 1999 Queen's Birthday Honours. Lui died on 9 July 2021 in Alofi at the age of 85. ==References== Category:2021 deaths Category:Premiers of Niue Category:1935 births
title: Frank Lui
